request.description: This web-service list downs all the available name spaces available at wordpress rest api
Use this route to see all the available WP rest routes in `wp/v2`
Use this web service to fetch meta data required for mobile app functionality.

item.name: User

request.description: Send username/email and password in post to get login auth token. We're currently using JWT auth plugin for login and acquiring tokens.

Send user info (email, social user id, source {facebook, google, apple}, display name) and get a jwt token in return.

This webservice checks for existing user based on email and then username, username is acquired from email. If no record found, it'll create new user and respond with user auth token.

this is directly accessing the rest route provided by JWT auth plugin.

Depricated, since 1.1.2

Reason: We don't want to limit the app side to rely on JWT auth plugin. Anyone can use any plugin and get the the token and authorise user. Use `houzez-mobile-api/v1/signin` instead.

formdata.description: on or off, if user agreed to terms and condition

updates user profile.
Edit user profile. Some older version of Houzez has issues with unlinking photo after this webservice. Call Fix User Photo api after this to fix the user photo.
